item.title: Bruce Willis' Favorite Die Hard Scene Is Not What You Would Expect And Explains Why The Movie Is So Good
item.description: Bruce Willis has named his favorite scene from Die Hard and it's an unconventional choice, but it also highlights why the movie is a masterpiece.

item.title: 35 Best Teen/Young Adult Movies Of All Time
item.description: Teen movies connect with audiences of all ages, and these 30 films perfectly capture this impactful part of life.

item.title: John Wayne Made A True Grit Sequel With One Of The Greatest Actresses Of All Time, And It Was Somehow A Major Western Misfire
item.description: John Wayne's sequel to True Grit, Rooster Cogburn, seemed to have everything going for it — including an iconic co-star — but it was still a failure.
